Package xyz.fsgek.common.convert.handlers

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DateConvertHandler.PatternFunction
    Function to parse date string to pattern and get date formatter.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeanConvertHandler
    Convert handler implementation which is used to support the conversion for bean.
    BooleanConvertHandler
    Convert handler implementation which is used to support conversion from any object to boolean types: If source is instance of Boolean, return itself; If source object is instance of Number, return true if Number.intValue() is 1, else false; If source object is not instance of Number, return Boolean.parseBoolean(String).
    BytesConvertHandler
    Convert handler implementation which is used to support the conversion between bytes types.
    CollectConvertHandler
    Convert handler implementation which is used to support the conversion of collection types.
    DateConvertHandler
    Convert handler implementation which is used to support conversion of date, duration and zone types.
    EnumConvertHandler
    Convert handler implementation which is used to support conversion from any object to enum types.
    NumberConvertHandler
    Convert handler implementation which is used to support the conversion from any object to number types.
    ReuseConvertHandler
    Convert handler implementation which is used to check type compatibility and reusability, it follows in order: If source object is null, return null; If target type and source type are equal: If GekConverter.Options#reusePolicy() is not GekConverter.Options#NO_REUSE, return source object, else return null; If target type is assignable from source type by GekReflect.isAssignableFrom(Type, Type): If GekConverter.Options#reusePolicy() is GekConverter.Options#REUSE_ASSIGNABLE, return source object, else return null; If target type is TypeVariable, return GekFlag.BREAK; If source type is WildcardType: If source type has an upper bound (? extends), return:
    StringConvertHandler
    Convert handler implementation which is used to support the conversion from any object to string with Object.toString().
